message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to compromise!
I think we can be fair and split it 60-40, with me getting the larger share. This way, we both get a decent amount, and we don't have to risk the money losing value.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to give you a bit more than before. Let's split it 58-42 and end this before the money loses more value!
